snippet.title: Sunblaze trailer – Wishlist and get the demo now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Get the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1525660/Sunblaze/
Or get the game on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/sunblaze

And after that join our Discord:  https://sunblaze.bonusstage.co/discord

”Whose blood is that on the walls?” -Josie
#sunblaze #platformer

Do you think you’ve got what it takes to be an actual superhero? Well, then you need to help Josie to beat the superhero training simulator, and to become the hero our world needs!

In this beautiful, hand-crafted precision platformer, you’ll play as Josie, aka. Sunblaze, with a mission to complete your superhero training. Your dad, a former superhero himself, built the training simulator dreaming of your journey to becoming a superhero. The simulator is full of puzzles, brain-tickling challenges, double jumps, dashes, spikes, drones... And a purrfect sidekick: the cat. You have got a cat. What else do you need?

Well, skills. That’s what you need. Do you think you’ve got ’em? Dive into Sunblaze now, and be the hero... called Sunblaze.
